channel.title: Stand-alone Server
channel.description: Does anyone have a stand-alone server? I seem to only have the client, and yes, I know with mopar scape the client is the server, but I want a stand-alone one, does anyone have a link to where I can find a stand-alone server? IT would be verry helpful, I hate having clients and servers in the same application.

item.title: Stand-alone Server
item.dc:creator: @Buzzyboy Buzzyboy
item.description:

Does anyone have a stand-alone server?
